name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi超生誕祭2021 ゲスト：角巻わため／桃鈴ねね [RyrHynHHbmY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Intro splash screen for AZKi Super Birthday Festival 2021 with guests Tsunomaki Watame and Momosuzu Nene.
AZKi, Tsunomaki Watame, and Momosuzu Nene perform 'Shiny Smily Story' on stage.
AZKi welcomes the audience and the guests introduce themselves.

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep seeing the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った
subtitles.english: Even with our different...

subtitles.original: 心で
subtitles.english: ...hearts

subtitles.original: 走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう!
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: おめでとう!
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: 歌って行きましょう! それではまずわため!
subtitles.english: Let's keep singing! First up, Watame!

subtitles.original: はい!
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: どこを見ても真っ暗な場所に芽生えてた
subtitles.english: It sprouted in a place where everything was pitch black

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな希望にこの瞳奪われ
subtitles.english: My eyes were captured by that tiny sliver of hope

subtitles.original: ねねち!
subtitles.english: Nene-chi!

subtitles.original: 不安に揺れる心を上手くチューニングして
subtitles.english: I'll tune my heart, which is swaying with anxiety

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな勇気を振り絞って言いたよ
subtitles.english: I mustered up a tiny bit of courage to say it

subtitles.original: 諦めの文字デリートして進む
subtitles.english: Deleting the word 'give up' and moving forward

subtitles.original: 苦しい時ももう私は一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because even in hard times, I'm not alone anymore

subtitles.original: だからもっと夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dreams even more

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像を超えてく世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that goes beyond your imagination

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try to access it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you have any regrets

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った
subtitles.english: Even with our different...

subtitles.original: 心で
subtitles.english: ...hearts

subtitles.original: 走り出そう
subtitles.english: Let's start running

subtitles.original: 仮想の空に輝く眩しい想いは
subtitles.english: The dazzling feelings shining in the virtual sky

subtitles.original: 見たことのない光をリアルに届けるよ
subtitles.english: Will deliver a never-before-seen light to the real world

subtitles.original: いつも聞こえるエールはここにキャプチャーして
subtitles.english: I'll capture the cheers I always hear right here

subtitles.original: また新しい光を私たくなるよ
subtitles.english: It makes me want to pass on a new light again

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔を保存して進む
subtitles.english: Saving your smile and moving forward

subtitles.original: 苦しい時も見返すよ力が湧くから
subtitles.english: Even in hard times, I'll look back at it and feel strength welling up

subtitles.original: 胸を張って夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams with pride

subtitles.original: 奇跡のストーリー一緒に作ろう
subtitles.english: Let's create a miraculous story together

subtitles.original: 終わらない夢を
subtitles.english: In this never-ending dream

subtitles.original: 誰一人欠かせない
subtitles.english: No one can be left out

subtitles.original: 愛が待ったこの世界
subtitles.english: In this world where love waits

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った
subtitles.english: Even with our different...

subtitles.original: 心で
subtitles.english: ...hearts

subtitles.original: 彩れ
subtitles.english: Add some color

subtitles.original: 悲しい時も寂しい時も
subtitles.english: Even when it's sad or lonely

subtitles.original: 信じ合えるものがある
subtitles.english: There's something we can believe in together

subtitles.original: 奏で鳴らし続けたい終わらない世界に
subtitles.english: I want to keep playing even in an endless world

subtitles.original: 溢れ出すよ笑顔たち
subtitles.english: Smiles will overflow

subtitles.original: 憧れの舞台立ちたい
subtitles.english: I want to stand on the stage of my dreams

subtitles.original: 私らしく輝きたい
subtitles.english: I want to shine in my own way

subtitles.original: 時になみだしてまた笑い合いたい
subtitles.english: Sometimes crying, then wanting to laugh together again

subtitles.original: 同じ未来を見ていたい
subtitles.english: I want to keep seeing the same future

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: 踏み出そう奇跡の一歩を
subtitles.english: Let's take a miraculous step forward

subtitles.original: 息を切らして夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams till I'm out of breath

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: The excitement won't stop

subtitles.original: 想像を超えてく世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that goes beyond your imagination

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみてよ
subtitles.english: Try accessing it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてここにない
subtitles.english: There's no regret here

subtitles.original: それぞれ違った
subtitles.english: Even with our different...

subtitles.original: 心で
subtitles.english: ...hearts

subtitles.original: 作ろう
subtitles.english: Let's create it

subtitles.original: はい! 改めまして、こんあずきー!
subtitles.english: Yes! Once again, Kon-AZKi!

subtitles.original: こんあずきー! ありがとう!
subtitles.english: Kon-AZKi! Thank you!

subtitles.original: えー、今日はですね、AZKi超生誕祭2021にお越しいただき、ありがとうございます!
subtitles.english: Um, today, thank you for coming to AZKi Super Birthday Festival 2021!

subtitles.original: やぁ、ということで今日はですね、なんと、なんと今日、二人に来てもらいまして
subtitles.english: Well, so today, surprisingly, surprisingly today, I have two people here with me

subtitles.original: いてます、ちょっと挨拶をぜひお願いします!
subtitles.english: They're here, so please introduce yourselves!

subtitles.original: わため!
subtitles.english: Watame!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ四期生、角巻わためです!
subtitles.english: From Hololive 4th Gen, I'm Tsunomaki Watame!

subtitles.original: こんばんどどー!
subtitles.english: Konban-dododo!

subtitles.original: あれ? ちびあずちゃんは?
subtitles.english: Huh? Where's Chibi-AZKi?

subtitles.original: 違います! ちょっとオープニング限定!
subtitles.english: No! That was just for the opening!

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします!
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you!
